DOC.brief_summary: In study aim compare lactation process mother undergo elective Caesarian section general anesthesia , spinal anesthesia , epidural anesthesia normal vaginal birth .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly divide 4 group : group G ( general anesthesia Caesarean section , n=21 ) , group S ( spinal anesthesia Caesarean section , n=21 ) , group E ( epidural anesthesia Caesarean section , n=21 ) , group V ( normal vaginal birth without anesthesia , n=21 ) . Blood sample 3 mililiters take patient 2,5 hour procedure oxytocin prolactin level blood sample determine . No patient receive premedication . Group G ( general anesthesia Caesarean section ) receive preoxygenation 100 % oxygen 3-5 minute intubation . In order let fetus minimally affected anesthetic agent , induction perform disinfection cover surgery area . Induction perform propofol ( 2 mg/ kg ) rocuronium ( 0,6 mg/kg ) . After onset neuromuscular block , patient intubate compression maneuver cricoid cartilage . Controlled ventilation provide anesthesia machine Datex Ohmeda S/5 Avance tidal volume 8-10 ml/kg , respiration frequency 10-12 min . Anesthesia maintain oxygen ( 50 % ) , air ( 50 % ) , sevoflurane 1 MAC . When necessary rocuronium 0,15 mg/kg administer . After delivery newborn , fentanyl 1-1,5 mcg/ kg administer . Patients group S ( spinal anesthesia Caesarean section ) receive 750-1000 mL 0,9 % NaCI solution ( 10-15 mL/kg ) infusion 20-30 minute . Under strict aseptic precaution 25G Quincke spinal needle introduce L3-L4 L4-L5 intervertebral space midline approach sit posture , , confirm free flow CSF , predetermine 10-11 mg drug solution ( hypertonic bupivacaine 0,5 % ) inject . We let operation begin sensory motor blockade verify . Oxygen 100 % ( 3 L. min ) administer throughout operation via nasal cannula . Patients group E ( epidural anesthesia Caesarean section ) receive 750-1000 mL 0,9 % NaCI solution ( 10-15 mL/kg ) infusion 20-30 minute . We conduct epidural anesthesia 18-gauge Tuohy needle L3-L4 L4-L5 epidural space midline approach sit position . 3 -5 minute injection 3 ml lidocaine test-dose , patient sign subarachnoid injection like prickle low extremity intravascular injection like nausea , vomit , tachicardia , tinnitus , 20-gauge epidural catheter insert cephalad . We inject 10 ml 0.5 % bupivacaine via epidural catheter . We let operation begin sensory motor blockade verify . Oxygen 100 % ( 3 L. min ) administer throughout operation via nasal cannula . Patients 3 group monitorised operation room monitor Datex-Ohmeda electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , mean blood pressure ( MBP ) , heart rate ( HR ) , peripheral oxygen saturation ( SPO2 ) record . Efedrin 5-10 mg and/or atropin 0,5 mg administer significant hypotension bradicardia occur . After delivery newborn 30 IU oxytocin 1000cc solution 0,9 % NaCI infuse patient hypertensive , methylergonovine 0,2 mg administer intramuscular . Patients group V ( spontaneous vaginal birth without anesthesia ) spectate gynecologist Clinic Gynecology Obstetrics delivery . They receive anesthesia . In group blood sample take 24th hour delivery oxytocin prolactin level measure . Plasma blood sample take delivery stored temperature -80°C . Prolactin level determine chemiluminescense immunoassay technique Cobas e 601 ( Roche® Diagnostics , Mannheim , Germany ) use commercial kit ( Roche® ) . Oxytocin level determine commercial ELISA kit ( Cusabio Biotech CO. Ltd ) . By patient onset time lactation record .
DOC.criteria: elective caesarian section normal vaginal delivery . 1840 year old risk American society anesthesiology grade2 Exclusion criterion : Nonelective case , plural pregnancy , Preterm pregnancy , Fetal anomaly , Retardation fetal development , Newborns birthweight 2500 gram , Infants risk aspiration meconium amnio , Pathologies affect acidbase balance , Diabetes mellitus , Hypertension , Antepartum hemorrhage , COPD ( chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ) , Rhesus incompatibility , Obstetric complication like congenital malformation , History malignant hypertermia , Morbid obesity , opioid sensitivity , Alcohol drug addiction , Diseases coronary arteria , Congestive heart failure , Serious anemia , History liver kidney disease , Hypovolemia , hypotension , Systemic inflammatory response syndrome , Sepsis , History allergic reaction drug use study , History drug affect lactation .
